alert.note: Alert for Sawyer; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL WASHBURN AND WEST CENTRAL SAWYER COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 AM CDT... At 1114 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Trego, or near Spooner, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Trego around 1125 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hayward and Stone Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
